segments.text: Give me your hand . ( takes Rose's hand ) Close your eyes . Go on . ( Rose closes her eyes ) Step up . Now hold on to the rail . Keep your eyes closed ; don't peek .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Step up onto the rail . Hold on . Keep your eyes closed . Trust me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , open your eyes . ( Rose opens her eyes . She stretches her arms , and Jack stands behind her , arms around her . )
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm fling , Jack . ( singing ) Come , Josephine , in my flying machine . Up she goes , and up she goes ...
segments.speaker: S2
